title: SurfQual
description: A program to check the quality of surfaces.

dist_output.title: Distance Output File
dist_output.description: File containing distances of nodes from the surface's center.

dist_color_output.title: Distance Color Output File
dist_color_output.description: Colorized file containing distances of nodes from the surface's center.

bad_nodes_output.title: Bad Nodes Output File
bad_nodes_output.description: File containing nodes with bad dot product values.

bad_nodes_color_output.title: Bad Nodes Color Output File
bad_nodes_color_output.description: Colorized file containing nodes with bad dot product values.

dotprod_output.title: Dot Product Output File
dotprod_output.description: File containing dot product values for all nodes.

dotprod_color_output.title: Dot Product Color Output File
dotprod_color_output.description: Colorized file containing dot product values for all nodes.

intersect_nodes_output.title: Intersect Nodes Output File
intersect_nodes_output.description: File containing indices of nodes forming segments that intersect the surface.
